introduction: 西娅递给罗佳一杯她朋友吐出来的口水。你不必喝，这只是一场游戏。女孩们自信地改写了生日聚会的规则，抛开了限制和约束。一切似乎都比平时更狂野，更不可预测，更令人兴奋。迪斯科球的粉色光线与游泳池的蓝色光线相遇，游泳池变成了一个水凉桑拿的热舞台，用于极限测试。Thea passes Ronja a glass full of her friends’ spit. You don’t have to drink it, it’s just a game. Self-confidently the girls rewrite the birthday party rules, casting aside constraints and inhibitions. Everything seems wilder, less predictable and more exciting than usual. The pink light of the disco ball meets the blue of the swimming pool, which is transformed into a water-cool and sauna-hot stage for the testing of limits.
